original_text: And it shall come to pass in that day, that the Lord shall punish the host of the high ones that are on high, and the kings of the earth upon the earth.
korean_text: 그 날에 여호와께서 높은 데에서 높은 군대를 벌하시며 땅에서 땅의 왕들을 벌하시리니

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass in that day
that the Lord shall punish the host of the high ones
and the kings of the earth upon the earth
